pages.title: Archwood Trees
pages.text:
Archwood trees are magical flora that can be rarely found in forests. Look around to find all variants of Archwood trees: Cascading Archwood, Flourising Archwood, Vexing Archwood and Blazing Archwood.
If you are lucky you might find an entire Archwood Forest!

If the Ars Elemental addon is installed you will also find Flashing Archwood Trees and Flashing Forest biomes.
